commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: This is the first time we will be playing the piano together like this. I am absolutely thrilled to be able to perform on the same piano with Maki.

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: We have put in hours of practice to bring you music that can only be performed today. We hope you enjoy it.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: That was an incredible performance! I knew they were practicing together, but I'm amazed at how perfectly in sync they were!

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: You've grown so much, Lili!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: I'm just a tiny bit jealous that they're so talented in their non-school idol activities too.

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Riko's delicate touch along with Maki's dynamism makes for such a dramatic sound.

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: Lili! Thanks for the amazing performance! Wait there! I'm coming up now!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Oh! Yoshiko, wait! I'm coming with you.

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: We should head over Maki and Riko's way too!

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: Lili! Maki! Your recital was a huge success!

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: Thank you all for coming to hear our performance today. You helped us both play with a level head.

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: You guys came to support us even outside of our school idol lives. Thank you.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: That was an amazing performance. I never would've guessed it was your first time.

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: Little demon Lili! These flowers are to celebrate your success today!

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: Wow! Why a bouquet of black lilies? Did you pick these out for me, Yoshiko?

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: Heh heh heh! An astute observation! Indeed I, Yohane, picked those out for my servant!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Do you like them, Riko?

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: I won't allow you to hide anything from me, Lili! Tell me the truth!

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: I can definitely tell that you and Karin had me in mind when you picked these flowers out. So that makes me super happy. Thanks, both of you!

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: ...Though, I don't recall agreeing to be your servant, Yoshiko.

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: Gasp!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: *Chuckle* I'm glad you like them. You two really are close.

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Kasumi and I picked these flowers out for you, Maki. Here you go!

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: Thank you... Are these delphiniums?

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Wow, you know what they're called?

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: Of course I do! It's my birth flower.

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Kasumi was the one who suggested we pick your birth flower.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: I picked them out myself, so of COURSE they're perfect for you.

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Thanks for inviting us today. I'm so glad to have met you, Maki.

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: Thank you! *Chuckle* But you're making too much of a fuss over some birth flowers.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: I'm sure you and Riko were busy and all, but we went through a pretty big ordeal ourselves.

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: An ordeal? What do you mean?

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: Just a lot of stuff happened! Phew, now that I have a moment to think, I realized I'm starving!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Heh heh heh. I knew this would happen! That's why I brought some awesome bread!

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: Oh my gosh, that looks amazing!

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: I know this place! I've been wanting to go. It must've been a real hassle to get it, huh?

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Mehehe... I bought a whole bunch just for today.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Then let's have some bread and chat away.

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Great idea! Riko? Maki? Is that good with you too?

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: It's rare I get to sit and chat after a recital, so that doesn't sound bad at all.

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: Yeah! We'll go get changed, so hold tight, okay? Let's go, Maki!

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: Okay, Riko!
